r.d: OS independet wrapper class for executing ping calls
r.n: * Fix Bug #758: get notice Undefined offset: when host isnt reachable [cconstantine] * Fix Bug #2559: Error handling ping output [cconstantine] * Fix Bug #7735: Net_Ping suffers from many E_NOTICE errors [cconstantine] * Fix Bug #8193: Wrong result on Windows [cconstantine] * Fix Bug #12153: Wrong result on Debian etch [cconstantine] * Fix Bug #12659: OS Detection incorrect [cconstantine]
